page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: Old industries like mining and railways have disappeared. New industries are being encouraged to come to our area by the building of pre-fabricated business units. They come complete with toilets and heating and come in all sizes, small enough for a one person business, or large enough for a small factory. We have a new trading estate at Stella Gill on the site of old railway sidings and it is still being added to. Most of the industries are light industry, mainly manufacturing. Here is a list of the wide range of goods produced:- car kits for home construction, kitchen units, fibre glass panels, car tyres, polythene bags, precision tools, custom built motor bikes, soft toys, Windows, Saunas, sports equipment, mechanical transmissions. There are also builders and various services.
